long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My girlfriend shops too much.

Chrome extension that removes most "checkout" buttons and carts to stop shopaholics.

Features: 
1. Toggle on/off at will
2. Shows total number of checkouts blocked
3. Shows number of days since shopping is blocked (resets to 0 when toggled off)
